s9.message: Fixed: Toolbar icon's tooltip shouldn't report "non-intrusive ads" as a subscription unless Filter Preferences shows it as such (forum topic).

s8.message:
Fixed: "Subscription contains disabled filters" message doesn't get updated on a filter
    update.

s2.message:
Reverted compatibility info change done in Adblock Plus 2.0.1 (addons.mozilla.org supports
    it now).

s1.message: The following lists the changes compared to Adblock Plus 2.0.1.

s7.message:
Firefox Mobile: Fixed: Extension options might be broken if opened too soon after starting
    the browser.

s6.message: Firefox Mobile: Fixed user interface to handle "non-intrusive ads" feature properly.

s5.message: Fixed: Filter editing is broken in Firefox 3.6 (forum topic).

s4.message: Made toolbar icon properly customizable in Thunderbird (forum topic).
